title: Client crashing during champ select
body: So I'm doing my placements but the client becomes unresponsive in champ select. I now have a 5 minute wait timer, is this automatically failing my placements slots?

replies.body:
When your client moves you from champion select into the champion loading screen, your network has to bridge a new connection to our game servers. If the client becomes unresponsive at this point, there's a chance that your network connection to our game servers is unstable.

Check out our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for ways you can improve your network connection. Hit me back up if you have any questions!
Well it happened again, I really hope this doesn't kill my placement.
